## Source: ossf-package-analysis (631082b0c15fead84d88085f4a4f282d2be494623b8970d06b4422857e6fc063)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'braintree-web-latest' @ 99.99.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
